subject: Madison Square Garden
Cable Television
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
lead_paragraph: Reversing the trend of Madison Square Garden being controlled by corporations, Cablevision’s board authorized a tax-free spinoff of the Garden into a stand-alone company.
snippet: Reversing the trend of Madison Square Garden being controlled by corporations, Cablevision’s board authorized a tax-free spinoff of the Garden into a stand-alone company.
